title: Drake Powell 2024-25 Regular Season Highlights | North Carolina Guard
text:
Drake Powell 2024-25 Regular Season Highlights | North Carolina Guard
North Carolina guard Drake Powell was a big contributor in his first year with the Tar Heels. Powell finished the season averaging 7.4 points, 3.3 rebounds and 1.0 assists per game. Powell shot an extremely efficient 49.5% from the floor and 37.4% from three-point range in his freshman year. Take a look at highlights from a great rookie season in the ACC by Drake Powell right here.
